de.dfki.oms.webapp

Class OMM_HTML_Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dfki.oms.webapp.OMM_HTML_Converter

  • public class OMM_HTML_Converter
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that converts OMS elements to HTML.

    • Method Detail

      • convertOMMToHTML

        public static java.lang.String convertOMMToHTML(OMMVersionManager ommVM,
                                                java.lang.String pathCorrection,
                                                java.lang.String memoryName,
                                                java.lang.String loggedInUser)
        Converts an object memory to an HTML representation.
        Parameters:
        ommVM - The memory's OMMVersionManager.
        pathCorrection - Path to the resources folder.
        memoryName - The memory's name.
        loggedInUser - Identifier of the current user.
        Returns:
        The memory as an HTML String.

      • convertOMMHeaderToHTMLTable

        public static java.lang.String convertOMMHeaderToHTMLTable(de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMHeader header,
                                                           java.lang.String memoryName)
        Converts an object memory's header to an HTML table String.
        Parameters:
        header - The OMMHeader to convert.
        memoryName - The memory's name.
        Returns:
        The header as an HTML table snippet.

      • convertOMMBlockToHTMLTable

        public static java.lang.String convertOMMBlockToHTMLTable(de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block,
                                                          java.lang.String memoryName)
        Converts a memory block to an HTML table String.
        Parameters:
        header - The OMMBlock to convert.
        memoryName - The memory's name.
        Returns:
        The header as an HTML table snippet.

      • convertOMMHeaderToHTMLEmpty

        public static java.lang.String convertOMMHeaderToHTMLEmpty(de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMHeader header,
                                                           java.lang.String memoryName)
        Creates an empty HTML table with header table functionality.
        Parameters:
        header - An OMMHeader that is not used at all.
        memoryName - Name of the memory that is not used either.
        Returns:
        An HTML table snippet without content.

      • convertOMMBlockToHTMLEmpty

        public static java.lang.String convertOMMBlockToHTMLEmpty(de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block,
                                                          java.lang.String memoryName)
        Creates an HTML table representing a block without payload.
        Parameters:
        header - An OMMBlock from which to get basic information, like title and ID.
        memoryName - Name of the memory that contains the block.
        Returns:
        An HTML table snippet without content.

      • convertPayload

        public static java.lang.String convertPayload(de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block)
        Converts a block's payload to an HTML representation.
        Parameters:
        block - The OMMBlock containing the payload.
        Returns:
        An HTML representation of the payload, varying with different payload types.

      • convertLink

        public static java.lang.String convertLink(de.dfki.omm.types.OMMFormat format,
                                           de.dfki.omm.types.TypedValue link,
                                           java.lang.String linkHash)
        Converts a typed value containing a link to an HTML snippet, respecting its format.
        Parameters:
        format - The link's OMMFormat.
        link - The TypedValue containing the link.
        linkHash - An optional hash for the link.
        Returns:
        The typed value as an HTML table snippet.

      • convertToHtml

        public static java.lang.String convertToHtml(java.net.URI uri)
        Converts a URI to an HTML anchor element.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI to convert.
        Returns:
        An HTML anchor snippet.

      • convertToHtml

        public static java.lang.String convertToHtml(java.net.URL url)
        Converts a URL to an HTML anchor element.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to convert.
        Returns:
        An HTML anchor snippet.

      • convertToHtml

        public static java.lang.String convertToHtml(de.dfki.omm.types.OMMSubjectTag tag)
        Converts a single OMM subject tag to an HTML table.
        Parameters:
        tag - The OMMSubjectTag to convert.
        Returns:
        An HTML snippet.

      • convertToHtml

        public static java.lang.String convertToHtml(java.util.Map.Entry<?,?> entry,
                                             boolean odd)
        Converts a map entry to an HTML table.
        Parameters:
        collection - The Map.Entry to convert.
        odd - Class of the table ("odd" or "even").
        Returns:
        An HTML table snippet.

                                             boolean odd)
        Converts an OMM structure info to an HTML table entry.
        Parameters:
        info - The OMMStructureInfo to convert.
        odd - Class of the table ("odd" or "even").
        Returns:
        An HTML table entry snippet.

        Converts a typed value to an HTML table.

        typedValue - The TypedValue to convert.
        Returns:
        An HTML table snippet.

      • convertToHtml

        public static java.lang.String convertToHtml(de.dfki.omm.types.TypedValue typedValue,
                                             boolean forceNoRemove)
        Converts a typed value to an HTML table.
        Parameters:
        typedValue - The TypedValue to convert.
        forceNoRemove - True, if there should be no removal option.
        Returns:
        An HTML table snippet.

        Returns:

        Converts an OMM entity to an HTML table.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        An HTML table snippet.

      • convertToHtml

        public static java.lang.String convertToHtml(java.lang.Object obj)
        Tries to convert an object to HTML text.
        Parameters:
        obj - The Object to convert. The object can be of type Locale, OMMEntity, String, URL, URI or OMMSubjectTag.
        Returns:
        The object as a String representation.
